messages.message: :alarm: :alarm: Hi folks, last month we spent ~$76K on our sandboxes.   This is basically doubled from where we were last month.  Please make sure to consolidate your sandboxes.   We’ll now start deleting sandboxes without any notifications.
All the personal sandboxes will be deleted by eod tomorrow.

I would also like to take the opportunity to remind everyone that sandbox owners are ultimately responsible of their deployments throughout their life - from creation to deletion..
• Sandboxes should be *hibernated* by the users when they are no longer used for the day. Users should *NOT* wait for auto-hibernation
• Sandboxes should be *deleted* by their owners when they are no longer to be used. Users should *NOT* wait to be alerted about deletion due to the deployment being idle for an extended period of time.
• If the sandbox creation failed and the owner can't troubleshoot it until next day, make sure to *delete* the deployment before signing off for the day. Hibernation may be acceptable if the creation process went far enough to allow for it.
thank you.  This is very clear.

Hi team,
Are there 23.08 feature critical sandbox used with integration and test across teams that we can request to keep online and not delete ?
We will need them for another week till 23.08 code cut.

https://reader-team-form-rec.aws.sandbox.instabase.com/ for Form recognizer integration - model dev and reader team.
I will check on https://ibllm-merge.aws.sandbox.instabase.com/ - was used by Rafal's team for advanced converse and is used by product to test feature internally cc: @Hari @Rafal
Okay.  I'll keep these active for one more week.  After that please delete it.
